com.adeptions.clarguments

Class BadArgException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.adeptions.clarguments.BadArgException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BadArgException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Thrown to indicate that some problem was encountered during args parsing
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
